    • Method Detail

      • drawStateDiagram

        public void drawStateDiagram(javafx.scene.layout.Pane sdPane)
        The method drawStateDiagram draws a state diagram which is a graphical representation of the source code for the Turning Machine.
        Parameters:
        sdPane - is the JavaFX class Pane used to draw the state diagram. PRECONDITION: sdPane is a Pane that already exists. POSTCONDITION: A state transition diagram is drawn in the sdPane using the Circle attributes from the class State.java. Each Circle represents a state, and the lines connecting the Circles represent the transitions.

      • clearPane

        public void clearPane(javafx.scene.layout.Pane sdPane)
